title: LoLPatcher, just solid black screen
body:
I've been trying to get back on league for a long time now I keep getting just a black screen the whole time. Patcher doesn't work can't click it anywhere and I haven't been able to play at all in months. It is quite aggravating since I do like to play even if I am a horrid player.

If anyone knows what's going on please let me know this is beyond angering.

I have looked around the internet for fixes, I've uninstalled and reinstalled I've completely manually removed league and deleting all folders, factory reset my computer, everything that I can think of.

I have even done everything that is mentioned here. I do not even know what to do anymore. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/RW1cIzkE-solution-for-the-black-screen-glitch-on-pvpnet-launcher

replies.body: Are you using the Legacy Client or the Beta Client?
